name: Tickets (Ravensa, Pitman)
description:
Tickets:
Tickets is a short game about a stressful morning.

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jame 2021. The theme was "Let there be chaos".

Controls:
Click and drag using your mouse to interact with items.

Note:
The game is made with mouse in mind, so it might not work on mobile devices.

Credits:
Art - Sarah van Loenen
Dev - Rens Kuilman

Music - audionautix.com
Sound - freesound.org
